Welcome to RecipeRover, here's a quick guide for you:

 1. Search with Ease: Type in the name of the dish in the search bar and click on Search button.
 Browse through the list of results to find the perfect match for your culinary adventure.

 2. Explore Recipe Summaries: Click on the recipe that catches your eye to view its summary.

 3. Dive into Details: Scroll down and click on the button for all details about this recipe.

 4. Save for Later: Love this recipe? Save it for later by clicking on save icon.
 Your saved recipes will be easily accessible whenever you're ready to whip up something delicious.


Here is how you can navigate in this application:

 Click on ☀ go to SunSeeker

 Click on 🎵 go to DeezerDiscover

 Click on 📕 go to WordWiz

 Click on ❤ go to saved recipes

 Click on 📥 save a recipe

 Click on 🗑 Ô∏èdelete a recipe

 Find your favorite recipes here!

Sunrise & Sunset My Favourites SunSeeker Latitude: Longitude: Latitude Longitude LOOKUP Do you want to delete this record: Question: Do you want to delete this record: Question: You deleted record # Yes No About SunSeeker, Version 1.0, created by Yu Song Back to main page Undo How to use SunSeeker:
SunSeeker is a program that provides sunrise and sunset information of a location. 

 SunSeeker has two search modes to find sunrise and sunset information: "by City" and "by Latitude and Longitude".

 Change search modes by clicking on the switch at the bottom of the screen.

 "by City" mode:
 Enter a city name as a location, click CHECK for sunrise and sunset details.

 "by Latitude and Longitude" mode:
 Enter Latitude and Longitude, click LOOKUP for sunrise and sunset details.

 Click on any record in "My Favourites" page to refresh and view sun details of a location

 Click on ❤ Goto "My Favourites".

 Click on 📥 to save this Record.

 Click on 🗑 Ô∏èto delete this Record.

 Click on 🍳 Goto RecipeRover.

 Click on 🎵 Goto DeezerDiscover.

 Click on 📕 Goto WordWiz.

Sorry, nothing found. This word is not available. No app to handle URL. Word saved. Word has already been saved. No word was selected. Do you want to delete this word? Yes No Undo You deleted the word. Dictionary created by Yuling Guo Instruction: OK Instructions:
 1. In the EditText field, enter a search term.
 2. To retrieve definitions, click the Search button.
 3. Click on one of the search results to view the detailed information in a separate fragment.
 4. To add a term to the list of saved terms, click the Save icon.
 5. Click the Saved button to access the saved terms.
 6. To remove a term, select it and choose the Remove icon from the drop-down list.
 7. Contact support for more help.
